message: Imam to tipkovnico a problem da zgornjih tipk nimam kje skonfigurati recimo da pritisnem f4 pa se ne odpre kalkulator. Logitech options+ pa ne ponudi oz najde te tipkovnice...
Rabiš logitech setpoint ne pa logitech options

U thx! Sj res :D Edin problem je k mi ne odpre setpointa k inštaliram napiše The application has failed to start because its side by side configuration in incorrect. Please see the application even log or use the command line sxstrace.exe tool for more detail.
https://answers.microsoft.com/en-us/win...  Sicer OP piše za miško, druga nisem našel.
